m_szDocTitle: Patent US20140045079 - Metal/oxygen battery with modified electrode - Google Patents
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Abstract In one embodiment, a metal/oxygen electrochemical cell includes a negative electrode, a separator positioned adjacent to the negative electrode, a positive electrode spaced apart from the negative electrode by the separator, the positive electrode including a porous electrically conductive material portion, the porous electrically conductive material portion coated with a conformally coated protective layer, and an electrolyte within the porous electrically conductive material portion.  Images(6)        Claims(16) 1. A metal/oxygen electrochemical cell
